document.full_text: former argentina teammates of diego maradona back his claims that there were no drug tests before a world cup playoff with australia in 1993. they also say they had no knowledge of receiving performance-enhancing drugs.
document.title: maradona's ex-teammates deny knowingly using drugs
lines_and_colors: former argentina teammates of diego maradona back his claims that there were no drug tests before a world cup playoff with australia in 1993. they also say they had no knowledge of receiving performance-enhancing drugs.
